lines.text: Can I speak to Nina Pavlovna?
Eh... No, nothing. I'll call back. Thank you.
Can I speak to Nina Pavlovna?

come to our place tomorrow. You'll meet Masha, and anyway... it's time. No, there'll be no one else. A friend we were at war together with - and his wife, I guess, - Masha with her friend, you and me. That's it. Yes. Uh-huh.
